#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define sc1ll(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define sc2ll(x,y) scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y)
#define sc3ll(x,y,z) scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&x,&y,&z)
vector<ll> arr(100001),flag(4,0);
bool check_equals(ll num)
{
    if(num==flag[0]||num==flag[1]||num==flag[2]||num==flag[3])
        return true;
    return false;
}
int main()
{
    ll test,i,j,num,minn,maxx,m,a,b,c,d,sum;
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
        cin>>num;
        maxx=INT_MIN;
        cin>>flag[0]>>flag[1]>>flag[2]>>flag[3];
        for(i=0;i<num;i++)
            cin>>arr[i];
        ll idx=0;
        while(idx<num)
        {
            if(check_equals(arr[idx]))
                idx++;
            else
                break;
        }
 
        if(idx>=num)
            cout<<0<<endl;
        else
        {
            //cout<<arr[idx]<<" ";
           ll max_so_far = arr[idx];
           ll curr_max = arr[idx];
 
           for(ll i = idx+1; i < num; i++)
           {
               if(check_equals(arr[i])==true)
                {
                    //cout<<"yes   ";
                    curr_max=INT_MIN;
                }
               else
               {
                    curr_max = max(arr[i], curr_max+arr[i]);
                    max_so_far = max(max_so_far, curr_max);
               }
               //cout<<max_so_far<<" ";
           }
           //cout<<endl;
           cout<<max_so_far<<endl;
        }
    }
}
